str2: Immediately, soon, at once. Adverb from euthus; directly, i.e. At once or soon.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Hearing, faculty of hearing, ear; report, rumor. From akouo; hearing.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To open. From ana and oigo; to open up.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
The tongue; by implication, a language.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.
Rightly. Adverb from orthos; in a straight manner, i.e. correctly.
